===Glyph origin===
{{Han etym}}
{{Han compound|米|t1=rice|唐|ls=psc|c1=s|c2=p}} – grains of sugar.

===Etymology===
Original meaning was “sweet rice cake” or “sugar syrup”. Cognate with {{och-l|餳}}.

Compare Proto-{{cog|onb|-}} ''lhaŋ<sup>2</sup>'' ("sugar"), whence {{w|zh:临城镇 (临高县)|Lincheng}} {{IPAchar|/haŋ˧˧/}}, {{w|zh:琼山区|Qiongshan}} {{IPAchar|/liaŋ˩˧/}}.
